meanings.sent1: She felt nerveless when faced with the big dog.
meanings.sent2: The nerveless boy hesitated before jumping into the pool.
meanings.sent3: Even though he tried to act brave, his nerveless voice gave him away.
meanings.sent4: Her nerveless behavior in the haunted house surprised her friends.
meanings.sent5: The nerveless soldier stood frozen in fear during the battle.

meanings.sent1: The numb hand felt nerveless after being asleep.
meanings.sent2: The nerveless wound went unnoticed until it became infected.
meanings.sent3: The nerveless foot didn't even flinch when tickled.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt nerveless as he waited for the test results.
meanings.sent5: The nerveless area on her arm made it difficult to feel the touch.
